attributes.action: stage an enquiry as to why satellite feeds for Premier League games are not allowed when sourced from an EU country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the idea of Europe is a common market then why are other EU countries permitted to screen Premiership football live, without a Sky subscription. Break Sky's monopoly and allow the whole of the country, rich or not, to enjoy the Premiership on TV
